thread.title: Ground News - Lawyer hails Youtuber for exposing scammers
thread.title_full: Ground News - Lawyer hails Youtuber for exposing scammers

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Lawyer hails Youtuber for exposing scammers
text:
Summary by Ground News Lawyer Aca Rayawa hailed US-based Fijian Youtuber Taniela Qalilawa (Dan Fiji ) for exposing scammers in Fiji. Mr Rayawa called on the Government and stakeholders to tighten legislation against cybercrimes. ANZ Bank Fiji chief risk officer Simon Vansittart indicated that associated bodies were working proactively together to identify new scams. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
FijiTimes Lawyer hails Youtuber for exposing scammers A seasoned lawyer has hailed US-based Fijian Youtuber Taniela Qalilawa (Dan Fiji)’s efforts in exposing scammers in Fiji and saved Fijians from being defrauded online. Former director of public prosecutions Aca Rayawa shared his thoughts at the 25th Attorney-General’s Conference on Denarau as he called on the Government and stakeholders to tighten legislation against cybercrimes. “Don’t you think that we have to relook at the whole structure?
